name: guanabana
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
another name for
soursop (= a large tropical fruit with white flesh and a green skin covered with sharp points, or the tree on which it grows): My favourite flavour was the guanabana. She grew up among the mango, guanabana and avocado trees.
More examplesFewer examplesSoursop is native to the West Indies, where it is also known as guanabana.If you order one of their three delicious mimosas (regular, blackberry and guanabana), you get free refills.He said no one would buy his guanabana and that was why his main crop was coca, for cocaine.There is no evidence that guanabanas (soursops) can be used to treat cancer.Offer your guests a taste of Latin America with a scoop of guanabana (soursop) sorbet drizzled with mango purée.
